ability.name: YES NO
ability.description: * Place the High Priestess on YES NO * Look at the top five cards of your deck. * Place any of them that you choose, shuffled, at the bottom of your deck. * Place the rest on top of your deck in any order. * Draw three cards. * Discard the High Priestess from YES NO at the end of your turn.
ability.flavor: Their eyes are wide with anticipation. Their third eye is wide with malice.
